observations.pandas: Mature ecosystem and flexible for time-series operations.
observations.polars: Faster ingestion and parallelized expressions, ideal for large structured data.

tradeoffs.syntax: Pandas feels natural for analysts; Polars requires functional-style thinking.
tradeoffs.ecosystem: Pandas integrates with scikit-learn, matplotlib, and statsmodels more smoothly.
tradeoffs.scalability: Polars handles multi-core and lazy evaluation better.
